title: Masters' Union Campus Tour (In person - Gurugram Campus)
UG Information Session and Campus Tour
desc: Join us at the Masters Union Campus in Gurugram to know more about the Undergraduate Programme and interact with the Masters’ Union Undergraduate team. Open to applicants, potential and their parents.

title: Test Drive
desc: Through this intensive 12-week program, high school students can explore 12 new career paths with mentorship from top industry experts from Google, Microsoft, Bain, Zomato and more

title: Masters’ Union Summer Startup Week
desc: Summer Startup Week is a 5 day immersive bootcamp where we help students build a startup with the help of industry leaders.

title: Nextgen Summer Skills Week
desc: This summer week is specially designed to give high school students the exposure to upcoming new-age fields such as Digital Marketing, Financial Investing, Artificial Intelligence, Entrepreneurship and App Designing.
